message.content:
cs.LG, cs.AI, cs.RO, cs.SY, cs.PL 

This paper is likely to belong to the sub-category of cs.LG (Machine Learning) as it introduces a new learning method called "gradient-based reinforcement planning" that combines gradient-based learning with explicit planning. It also discusses policy-gradient methods, which are a type of machine learning algorithm. 

It could also belong to cs.AI (Artificial Intelligence) as reinforcement learning is a subfield of AI. 

Additionally, it could be categorized under cs.RO (Robotics) or cs.SY (Systems and Control) as these fields often use reinforcement learning for control and decision-making tasks. 

Finally, it could be categorized under cs.PL (Programming Languages) as it discusses the derivation of formulas for policy gradients, which involves programming and algorithmic design.
